description.narrative: Capacity Building-Ministry of Economy
Capacity building for the national expertise in the Ministry of Economy
independent political entity
policy, planning and administration
Enhanced national capacity in national development planning through UNDP's support.

comment.narrative: The country is largely dependent on expatriates in designing, planning and implementing National Development Plans

title.narrative: TRANSFORMING-HIV RESPONSE IN A RAPIDLY DEVELOPING SOCIET

description.narrative: TRANSFORMING-HIV RESPONSE IN A RAPIDLY DEVELOPING SOCIET
The project aims at preventing the increase of HIV/AIDS prevalence
Awareness among major stakeholders raised. Social stigma debunked.

comment.narrative: Lack of Awareness about HIV/AIDS and prevalence of stigma around the topic, within the Governmental/public and privates sectors along with the media and religious leaders

description.narrative: The development of a framework for setting the National Youth Strategy and a outline of steps needed for developing National Youth Strategy Action Plan under the umbrella of the Ministry of Culture, Youth, and Community Development (MCYCD).

The development of a framework for setting the National Youth Strategy and a outline of steps needed for developing National Youth Strategy Action Plan under the umbrella of the Ministry of Culture, Youth, and Community Development (MCYCD).
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - policy, planning and administration

Output 1 Report on the Assessment of the situation. This output will contribute to the main Outcome (NYS and Action Plan) which will be achieved later when a full-fledged Project is implemented.
Output 2 An agreed upon project document including work plan and budget Activities:

comment.narrative: Activities: 1.1 Present international experience on youth strategies and development. 1.2 Collect, share and maintain knowhow, expertise and best practices and guidelines and conduct consultations with stakeholders. 1.3 Review operational policies, standard and specification. 1.4 Review the execution of youth initiatives at the federal and emirates level 1.5 Prepare a presentation to the MCYCD authority, relating the finding and recommendations

description.narrative: Enhancing the Capacities of the Ministry of Development and International Cooperation and to enhance the national abilities for identifying the fields of development, international cooperation, development, and foreign aid.

title.narrative: Cost Sharing Agreement between MICAD and UNDP
Cap bldg Ministry of Dev and Int Coop pro doc

description.narrative: To enhance the capacities of MICAD , programs and foreign aid in all forms of development programs and evaluating the impact of these programs.
policy, planning and administration

comment.narrative: The country office aims at providing continuous support to the ministry in recruiting 30 experts and advisors in various fields including development sectors, international cooperation, foreign aid provided by UAE all over the world.

UNDP was able to successfully support the ministry in developing the capacities of 20 experts and consultants in the foreign aid department, finance and administration sector, and international cooperation sector. In addition, the country office has successfully supported the ministry to recruit advisors to the minister.

description.narrative: Environment Publications
Environment Publications
State of Energy Report and Dubai Green Economy Report Produced

comment.narrative: No Existing State of Energy Report in the UAE
Quality Assure, produce and launch two publications in 2015: UAE State of Energy Report and Dubai Green Economy Report
The Dubai Green Economy Report 2016 and UAE State of Energy Report 2016 were both quality assured by UNDP and produced. The launch is to take place end of November 2015.

title.narrative: Producing the National Gender Gap Report

description.narrative: The project aims at producing a flagship that will address the need for a consistent and comprehensive measure for gender equality that can track a countrys progress over time.
The project aims at producing a flagship that will address the need for a consistent and comprehensive measure for gender equality that can track a countrys progress over time.
Social Protection, Land Housing and Community Amenities - social services (incl youth development and women+ children)
Produce data analysis and produce a comprehensive National Gender Gap report

comment.narrative: No sex disaggregated data available, pertaining to the selected areas. No Report with relevant guiding information to the government exist.
